```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(htmltools)
```

```{r}
samplelocations <- data.frame(
  name = c("Bamfield Marine Science Centre", "BMSC South Dock", "West Government Dock", "Island Health Dock"),
  lat = c(48.83535, 48.833394, 48.828944, 48.827150),
  lon = c(-125.13463, -125.136765, -125.139980, -125.137254)
)
```

```{r}
iconbmsc <- awesomeIcons(
  icon = "map-marker",
  iconColor = "white",
  library = "fa", 
  markerColor = "red")

iconbmscdock <- awesomeIcons(
  icon = "transparent",
  iconColor = "transparent",
  library = "fa",
  markerColor = "blue")

iconwestgov <- awesomeIcons(
  icon = "map-marker",
  iconColor = "white",
  library = "fa",
  markerColor = "blue")

iconhealth <- awesomeIcons(
  icon = "map-marker",
  iconColor = "white",
  library = "fa",
  markerColor = "blue")
```



```{r}
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.PositronNoLabels) %>%
  addAwesomeMarkers(
    lng = -125.13463, lat = 48.83535,
    label = "Bamfield Marine Science Centre",
    icon = iconbmscdock,
    labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = TRUE, textOnly = TRUE, direction = "right", 
                                style = list( 
                                  "color" = "black",
                                  "font-weight" = "bold",
                                  "font-size" = "10px", 
                                  "background" = "white",
                                  "padding" = "3px", 
                                  "border-radius" = "5px"
                                  ))) %>%
  addAwesomeMarkers(
    lng = -125.136765, lat = 48.833394,
    label = "BMSC South Dock",
    icon = iconbmscdock,
    labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = TRUE, direction = "right",
                                style = list( 
                                  "color" = "black",
                                  "font-weight" = "bold",
                                  "font-size" = "10px", 
                                  "background" = "white"))) %>%
  addAwesomeMarkers(
      lng = -125.139980, lat = 48.828944,
      label = "West Government Dock",
      icon = iconwestgov,
      labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = TRUE, direction = "left",
                                  style = list( 
                                  "color" = "black",
                                  "font-weight" = "bold",
                                  "font-size" = "10px", 
                                  "background" = "white"))) %>%
  addAwesomeMarkers(
      lng = -125.137254, lat = 48.827150,
      label = "Island Health Dock",
      icon = iconhealth,
      labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = TRUE, direction = "right",
                                  style = list( 
                                  "color" = "black",
                                  "font-weight" = "bold",
                                  "font-size" = "10px", 
                                  "background" = "white")))
```
